job_tasks.phrase: You'll work directly with entrepreneurs and business counterparts to bring AI solutions from idea to production.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the end-to-end process of taking an AI concept and making it a functional product, which aligns with integrating AI into production systems.

job_tasks.phrase: We take care of the full development cycle from exploring and identifying opportunities, experimenting, and creating prototypes, to developing scalable products.
job_tasks.justification: This covers the entire software development lifecycle, from initial concept to scalable product delivery, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Effectively this means that per specific use-case our focus can be on a variety of Engineering solutions ranging from Backend to Frontend to API's to LLM to Machine Learning Models.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions various software engineering domains (Backend, Frontend, APIs) as part of the role's responsibilities, even when dealing with AI/LLM components.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinate the full project lifecycle, applying your varied skills to transfrom AI concepts into business-ready solutions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights project coordination and transforming concepts into production-ready solutions, which are key software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply your multifaceted skills to to projects, ensuring all aspects are covered from AI through Frontend
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes a broad range of engineering skills, including frontend development, in the context of AI projects.
This refers to the experimental phase of AI development, which can involve model experimentation and prototyping.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and implement new AI technologies (like chatGPT), algorithms and methods in one of our bank wide projects
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to experimenting with and implementing AI technologies and algorithms, which falls under model development and adaptation.
This indicates the use of Generative AI, which often involves prompt engineering or RAG techniques to interact with models like ChatGPT.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and implement new AI technologies (like chatGPT)
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning ChatGPT specifically points towards working with LLMs, which inherently involves prompt engineering and related techniques.
This directly indicates a need to understand the business context and align AI solutions with business goals.

job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need for interaction with business stakeholders to understand and translate business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: understanding of the business context within which AI solutions are embedded
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the requirement for understanding the business environment for AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in the ideation and design of AI solutions with business experts
job_tasks.justification: This task involves collaborating with business experts to conceptualize AI solutions, requiring business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Support initiatives at ABN AMRO Innovation with data-driven insights
job_tasks.justification: This involves using data insights to support business initiatives, requiring an understanding of business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: drive the adoption of (Gen)AI across the bank by working with Client Units on some of the hardest (Gen)AI problems within ABN AMRO.
job_tasks.justification: This task requires understanding the bank's strategic goals for AI adoption and working with business units to solve problems.

soft_skills.justification: This directly refers to a mindset focused on innovation.
This indicates a proactive and ownership-oriented approach.

soft_skills.justification: This requires strong communication and collaboration skills to work with business stakeholders.

soft_skills.justification: This shows a willingness to learn and implement new technologies.

soft_skills.justification: This implies a problem-solving approach to take concepts to a functional state.

soft_skills.phrase: Coordinate the full project lifecycle, applying your varied skills to transfrom AI concepts into business-ready solutions
soft_skills.justification: This requires a pragmatic approach to manage the entire lifecycle and deliver solutions.

profile.rationale: The role emphasizes a balanced mix of software engineering tasks (Backend, Frontend, API development, full lifecycle management) and AI specialization. Specifically, it mentions leveraging GenAI, working with technologies like ChatGPT, and implementing AI systems. The requirement for strong machine learning, system design, and coding skills, combined with business context understanding, points to a Core GenAI Engineer profile. The tasks are not solely focused on model development (Specialist) nor just integrating existing AI into a product without deep AI involvement (AI-Adjacent Software Engineer). It requires both building the AI solutions and integrating them into production systems.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear about the blend of software engineering and AI responsibilities. It explicitly mentions GenAI, specific technologies like ChatGPT, and a wide range of engineering tasks (backend, frontend, APIs). The description of the full development cycle and the need for both AI and engineering skills makes the profile assignment straightforward and highly confident.
